preference.question: How do you drink your coffee?
preference.name: Capsules
preference.description: Compatible with Espresso systems and similar brewers

preference.name: Filter
preference.description: For pour over or drip methods like Aeropress, Chemex, and V60.

preference.name: Espresso
preference.description: Dense and Finely ground beans for an intense, flavorful experience.

beanType.question: What type of coffee?
beanType.name: Single
beanType.description: Distinct, high quality coffee from a specific family-owned farm.

beanType.name: Decaf
beanType.description: Just like regular coffee, except the caffeine has been removed.

beanType.name: Blended
beanType.description: Just like regular coffee, except the caffeine has been removed.

quantity.question: How much would you like?
quantity.name: 250g
quantity.description: Perfect for the solo drinker. Yields about 12 delicious cups.

quantity.name: 500g
quantity.description: Perfect option for a couple. Yields about 40 delectable cups.

quantity.name: 1000g
quantity.description: Perfect for offices and events. Yields about 90 delightful cups.

grindOption.question: Want us to grind them?
grindOption.name: Wholebean
grindOption.description: Best choice if you cherish the full sensory experience.

grindOption.name: Filter
grindOption.description: For drip or pour-over coffee methods such as V60 or Aeropress.

grindOption.name: Cafetiere
grindOption.description: Course ground beans specially suited for french press coffee

delivery.question: How often should we deliver?
delivery.name: Every Week
delivery.description: R22.00 per shipment. Includes free first-class shipping.

delivery.name: Every 2 Weeks
delivery.description: R32.00 per shipment. Includes free first-class shipping.

delivery.name: Every Month
delivery.description: R42.00 per shipment. Includes free first-class shipping.
